name: Cicada Store
tag_list: cicada, technology, security, gadget, usb, microsoft, pc, laptop, computer, monitoring, siren, theft, encrypt, alert, lightweight, business, student, office, data, patented, threat, anti-theft, professional
overview:
Cicada is a non-invasive and scalable security solution that can be configured to your work environment.

Designed for individual or enterprise use, Cicada is an effective security solution for consultants, students, and office staff.

Work while your computer is protected. The Cicada is a discreet USB based security device – no larger than a common USB flash storage drive. Cicada’s real-time asset protection monitors your computer for motion, device insertion or removal, as well as other triggers, to detect and deters theft or tamper the instant your computer is most vulnerable.
